arStrings.szText: When Blood Golem heals itself with its active ability, you are healed for {c_number}[{SF_2}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life for each enemy drained. While your Blood Golem is {c_important}Healthy{/c}, they gain {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction and {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
